subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Defensive end J. J. Watt has 11 ½ sacks, five fumble recoveries, an interception, two defensive touchdowns, and has added offense to his repertory with three receptions, all of which went for touchdowns.
snippet: Defensive end J. J. Watt has 11 ½ sacks, five fumble recoveries, an interception, two defensive touchdowns, and has added offense to his repertory with three receptions, all of which went for touchdowns.
